## isInt variable

Is the parameter a valid integer (excluding 0 and Infinity)

**Signature:**

```typescript
isInt: (num: unknown) => boolean
```

## Example 1


```ts
isInt(1);
true
```

## Example 2


```ts
isInt(0);
false
```
